rubrics.rubric: Renal colic: Pain from kidney to bladder (radiating downward)
rubrics.modality: Dragging or shooting pain from loin to urethra
rubrics.notes: Pathognomonic of ureteric stone movement

rubrics.rubric: Pain in kidney region < motion, > pressure or lying on painful side
rubrics.modality: Aggravated by walking or jerky movements
rubrics.notes: Mechanical aggravation confirms calculus

rubrics.rubric: Burning urination with sharp cutting pain at end of urination
rubrics.modality: Pain peaks after urine passes
rubrics.notes: Bladder/urethra irritated by sharp calculi fragments

rubrics.rubric: Red or brick-dust sediment in urine (gravel)
rubrics.modality: Urine cloudy or sandy, offensive odor
rubrics.notes: Classic physical marker of uric acid stones

rubrics.rubric: Frequent urging with scanty urination and great pain
rubrics.modality: Patient feels incomplete emptying of bladder
rubrics.notes: Urethral irritation and obstruction by calculi

rubrics.rubric: Renal colic > warm applications; < cold drinks
rubrics.modality: Local heat soothes spasmodic pain
rubrics.notes: Differentiating modality in acute cases

rubrics.rubric: Renal pain with nausea, vomiting or faintness
rubrics.modality: Pain so intense it affects stomach and nerves
rubrics.notes: Renal crisis with vagal collapse picture

rubrics.rubric: Renal calculi in right kidney
rubrics.modality: Pain localised or referred to right groin
rubrics.notes: Side preference used for remedy filtering

rubrics.rubric: Renal calculi in left kidney
rubrics.modality: Pain in left loin and ureter, left thigh
rubrics.notes: Left-sided predominance key in remedy choice

rubrics.rubric: Renal pain alternating with sciatica or lower limb pain
rubrics.modality: Sciatica settles → kidney pain starts
rubrics.notes: Pressure shift in urinary vs. nerve pathway

rubrics.rubric: Renal colic following suppression of skin eruptions
rubrics.modality: H/O long use of ointments before onset of stones
rubrics.notes: Suppressed excretory function redirects via kidneys

rubrics.rubric: Renal pain after anger, humiliation, or suppressed emotions
rubrics.modality: Patient unable to express or release tension
rubrics.notes: Mind–urinary organ axis critical in chronic cases

rubrics.rubric: Renal calculi alternating with urticaria or eczema
rubrics.modality: Skin clears up → renal colic starts
rubrics.notes: Alternating miasmatic shift between skin and kidneys

rubrics.rubric: Renal stones in diabetic patients with acidity
rubrics.modality: Stone attacks in metabolically compromised patients
rubrics.notes: Metabolic stress → poor renal filtration

rubrics.rubric: Renal colic alternating with gastric or hepatic complaints
rubrics.modality: When digestion improves, kidney pain appears
rubrics.notes: Liver–kidney–gut cycle with miasmatic axis

rubrics.rubric: Renal calculi with chronic uric acid diathesis
rubrics.modality: Uric acid crystals seen in urine or blood
rubrics.notes: Gouty tendency with kidney involvement

rubrics.rubric: Renal colic preceded by fear, fright, or emotional shock
rubrics.modality: Fear triggers spasmodic kidney pain
rubrics.notes: Emotional causation key in acute attack cases

rubrics.rubric: Renal stone pain in thin, sensitive, chilly persons
rubrics.modality: Better warmth, emotional validation
rubrics.notes: Constitutional guidance for long-term remedy

rubrics.rubric: Renal colic with strong family history of kidney stones
rubrics.modality: Early age, recurrent tendency
rubrics.notes: Inherent metabolic type needing chronic remedy

rubrics.rubric: Kidney stone pain with sensation of sand or gravel passing

rubrics.notes: Classic passage-phase symptom
